allow:
Bash(PGPASSWORD='5tayB0t2025Prod' psql -h staybot-prod-psql.postgres.database.azure.com -U staybot_admin -d staybot -c "
SELECT 
    ""TenantId"",
    ""Keyword"",
    ""UrgencyLevel"",
    ""Category"",
    ""TargetMinutesToResolve"",
    ""IsSafetyRisk"",
    ""RequiresManagerEscalation""
FROM ""MaintenanceUrgencyRules""
WHERE ""TenantId"" = 1
ORDER BY ""Priority"" DESC, ""Keyword""
LIMIT 15;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='5tayB0t2025Prod' psql -h staybot-prod-psql.postgres.database.azure.com -U staybot_admin -d staybot -c "SELECT ""Id"", ""GuestName"", ""Phone"", ""Status"", ""CheckinDate"", ""CheckoutDate"" FROM ""Bookings"" WHERE ""Phone"" = ''+27783776207'' AND ""TenantId"" = 1 LIMIT 5;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='5tayB0t2025Prod' psql -h staybot-prod-psql.postgres.database.azure.com -U staybot_admin -d staybot -c "SELECT ""Id"", ""TaskType"", ""Description"", ""Priority"", ""CreatedAt"" FROM ""StaffTasks"" WHERE ""TenantId"" = 1 ORDER BY ""Id"" DESC LIMIT 5;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD='5tayB0t2025Prod' psql -h staybot-prod-psql.postgres.database.azure.com -U staybot_admin -d staybot -c "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ""FAQs"";")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='5tayB0t2025Prod' psql -h staybot-prod-psql.postgres.database.azure.com -U staybot_admin -d staybot -c "SELECT m.""Id"", m.""Direction"", LEFT(m.""Body"", 200) as ""Body"", m.""CreatedAt"" FROM ""Messages"" m WHERE m.""ConversationId"" = 174 ORDER BY m.""CreatedAt"" DESC LIMIT 5;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='5tayB0t2025Prod' psql -h staybot-prod-psql.postgres.database.azure.com -U staybot_admin -d staybot -c "SELECT ""Id"", ""Category"", ""Title"", LEFT(""Content"", 80) as ""Content"" FROM ""BusinessInfo"" WHERE ""Category"" = ''wifi_credentials'' AND ""TenantId"" = 1;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='5tayB0t2025Prod' psql -h staybot-prod-psql.postgres.database.azure.com -U staybot_admin -d staybot -c "SELECT ""Id"", ""TaskType"", ""Description"", ""CreatedAt"" FROM ""StaffTasks"" WHERE ""Description"" ILIKE ''%hair%'' OR ""Description"" ILIKE ''%dryer%'' ORDER BY ""Id"" DESC LIMIT 5;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='5tayB0t2025Prod' psql -h staybot-prod-psql.postgres.database.azure.com -U staybot_admin -d staybot -c "UPDATE ""BusinessInfo"" SET ""Content"" = ''{""network"": ""PanoramaView_Guest"", ""password"": ""Welcome2024""}'' WHERE ""Id"" = 83 RETURNING ""Content"";")
